Rules.InvariantScript:
//Reset controlls to defualt values, otherwise previously selected values would appear
Concurrent(
    Reset(drpSystem),
    Reset(drpEntityName),
    Reset(drpCurrency),
    Reset(drpAccountNo)
)

"Welcome, "& Parent.compUser &"!
Today is: " & Concatenate(Text( Today(), "dddd" ),", ",Text( Today(), "dd/mm/yy" )) & ""

//Variable update to hide grpConfirmDelete controls
UpdateContext({Deleting: false})

//Update of variable responsible for activation of grpConfirmDelete controls
Switch(
    ThisItem.locStatus,
    "Saved",
    UpdateContext({Deleting: true}),
    "Ready to save",
    RemoveIf(
        colUserTemplateNew,
        locGUID = ThisItem.locGUID
    ),
    "Ready to delete",
    UpdateIf(
        colUserTemplateNew,
        locGUID = ThisItem.locGUID,
        {locStatus: "Saved"}
    ),
    false
)

//Color visualization of accounts with statuses that require saving
If(Self.Text = "Saved",Green,Red)

//Confirmation message for user in HTML format "
Are you sure you want delete this account?
Please remember to save your template.
"

//Variable update to hide grpConfirmDelete controls
UpdateContext({Deleting: false})

/*Check for selected account if existing in User Template collection:
 - if yes - notify user by Error Message showed for 5 secs, 
 - if not - collect this account and mark it as 'Ready to save' with unique ID created by guid function*/
If(
    !IsEmpty(
        Filter(
            colUserTemplateNew,
            Account = drpAccountNo.Selected.Result
        )
    ),
    Notify(
        "Account you are trying to add already exist on your template! Choose another account.",
        NotificationType.Error,
        5000
    ),
    Collect(
        colUserTemplateNew,
        {
            SystemERP: drpSystem.Selected.Result,
            BusinessUnit: drpEntityName.Selected.Result,
            Currency: drpCurrency.Selected.Result,
            Account: drpAccountNo.Selected.Result,
            //Using Person columns requires specific information that need to be patached to SP/collection
            User: {
                '@odata.type': "#Microsoft.Azure.Connectors.SharePoint.SPListExpandedUser",
                Claims: "i:0#.f|membership|" & gblUser.mail,
                Department: "",
                DisplayName: gblUser.displayName,
                Email: gblUser.mail,
                JobTitle: "",
                Picture: ""
            },
            locStatus: "Ready to save",
            locGUID: GUID()
        }
    )
)
